body:
Day 9 - Manga 135*
Yeah, I fucking hate Evangelion now, especially the hentai Mangas. They are all the same. Some shitty rape story with shitty art style. 
1/10.
Reading this will make you forever immune to all curses in the future. All chain letters or comments are now null and void forever.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me I'm sorry
